text: Judgment Day (2007) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE). It took place on May 20, 2007 at the Scottrade Center in St. Louis, Missouri. It was the ninth Judgment Day event held by WWE. ==Matches== No. Results Stipulations Times 1 Kane defeated William Regal (with Dave Taylor) Singles match N/A 2 Ric Flair defeated Carlito by submission Singles match 15:34 3 Bobby Lashley defeated Team McMahon (Mr. McMahon (c), Shane McMahon, and Umaga) Handicap match for the ECW World Championship 1:15 4 CM Punk defeated Elijah Burke Singles match 16:50 5 Randy Orton defeated Shawn Michaels by knockout Singles match 4:32 6 The Hardys (Matt and Jeff Hardy) (c) defeated Lance Cade and Trevor Murdoch Tag team match for the World Tag Team Championship 15:02 7 Edge (c) defeated Batista Singles match for the World Heavyweight Championship 10:38 8 Montel Vontavious Porter defeated Chris Benoit (c) 2â€“0 Two out of Three falls match for the WWE United States Championship 12:46 9 John Cena (c) defeated The Great Khali by submission Singles match for the WWE Championship 8:15 ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Judgment Day 2007 website Category:2007 in professional wrestling Category:Sports in St. Louis, Missouri Category:WWE Judgment Day Category:2007 in the United States Category:2000s in Missouri Category:History of St. Louis, Missouri
title: Judgment Day (2007)
